<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:8ad5752a1bef61108d594047bc4bcb44ISNOTEMPTY^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Partage d'un rapport en orthophonie ou en audiologie">d116daa11ba72110d991c882604bcbd2</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>false</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>false</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
g_form.getReference('eleve', function(gr) {
    var consentement_parental = gr.u_consentement_parental;
    if (consentement_parental  == 'true'){
		alert('alert');
        g_form.setDisplay('consentement_parental_verbal',false);
    }
     
 });	
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
g_form.getReference('eleve', function(gr) {
    var consentement_parental = gr.u_consentement_parental;
    if (consentement_parental  == 'false'){
		alert('alert');
        g_form.setDisplay('consentement_parental_verbal',true);
    }
     
 });	
  
}
]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Partage d'un rapport</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ServiceNowDeveloper2@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-29 14:37:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>69dc6ce81bb361108d594047bc4bcb47</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Partage d'un rapport</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Triage 2.0" source="x_ndecd_triage_2_0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Triage 2.0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_69dc6ce81bb361108d594047bc4bcb47</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ServiceNowDeveloper2@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-30 15:59:37</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
